abstract: Golf Roundup; Justin Rose shoots seven-under-par 63 at Bridgestone Invitational in Akron, Ohio, giving him share of lead with Jim Furyk going into final day of tournament; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Rose was four shots behind with four holes to play when he made a 10-foot birdie putt on the 15th, hit a wedge to 3 feet for birdie on the par-5 16th and closed out the round with a 40-foot birdie on the 18th.

headline.main: Justin Rose Ties for Third-Round Lead With a Closing Flurry of Birdies
headline.print_headline: Rose Ties for Third-Round Lead With a Closing Flurry of Birdies

snippet: Rose was four shots behind with four holes to play when he made a 10-foot birdie putt on the 15th, hit a wedge to 3 feet for birdie on the par-5 16th and closed out the round with a 40-foot birdie on the 18th.
